Items.Description: . GREAT DAY!!!!! Start shopping for Christmas to avoid delay in deliveries and.... make purchases now and save on the perfect GIFT!!!! Please check my other auctions for wonderful gifts to your love ones!!!!!!! Buy From eBay Powersellers!!! please visit my ebay store for more rare designer items! Thank you!!! I want to thank everyone for their comments/suggestions/helps/supports in finding me a solution to solve the matter of other users from copying my pics! Thank you to all the wonderful people on the net! I want to say sorry to other wonderful people that try to help me and i did not email back, Thank you too! ****First of all this message is for the ebay and yahoo sellers!!!**** ***Dear EBay/Yahoo Sellers~ Please stop copying my pictures or copying word for word from my auctions to post on your auctions. Please provide your own pictures and auction description, because I would not like bidders to confuse all of us as of one seller. And please make this easier for all of us. I'm the original owner of these pictures! Thank you! Warning! Dear Bidders please be careful when bidding for name brand stuff especially Popular name items. The best way to find out is to take it to the Boutique or places that sells them. If you have any question on this please feel free to email me, I will be very glad to help you!!! OK! First of all, i want to make sure that you understand this is for an 100% Authentic Newest 2001 collection and one of the Hottest TIFFANY item -- ****TIFFANY 925 Pure Stealing Silver Venetian Link Bracelet!!!*** This auction will include the gift box w/ lid and white ribbon, the care card, and the famous powder blue dust pouch!!!! Measures 7.5" inches long, perfect for everyone!!! If this is too long for you then you can bring it back to Tiffany and have them adjust/cut it to your wrist size. Feel lucky if you have one!!! It is Brand New, and never been used!!!!! Give it out as a gift or keep it!!! This is a great piece for your love one!!! All Time Sold out! Popular piece!!!! Suprise Chanel sample will also be included in this auction!!! I notice that there are many fakes out there and i do not want to be mistaken as one of them. If i listed 'authentic', it means that i purchased personally at an authentic retailer. And if you see 'authenticity not guaranteed' that means it is 100% FAKE or a good copy! International buyers: please email us for shipping & insurance quotes. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ E-Shopping With Confidence As a buyer in the Electronic commerce era you need to be reassured of real protection in the areas of privacy, security and redress. We suggest the following guidelines: 1._Select a seller with a good reputation (see feedback) 2._Be specific about the date you need the item when you send payment. 3._If using a credit card select a seller with a secure server. 4._Ask questions before you bid. 5._Inquire about refund policy. 6._Check seller's shipping rates. 7._Bid early. We have been selling for over five years on eBay. Together we have more than 3000 positive feedback points. We guarantee our merchandise to be as advertised and welcome queries regarding it. We pack and ship carefully without inflated shipping charges. Enjoy shopping on line confidently. ___ Meredith & Dana S. Whaley ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ AUCTION CLOSING FAQ: 1. We ship in the order in which we receive payment unless there is an emergency request. 2. We ship twice a week. As a result, Buy It Now does not automatically mean Ship It Now. 3. Money Orders are treated the same as checks and do not speed delivery. We prefer checks because should they be lost in the mail they are far easier for the buyer to trace. 4. We do not, as so many others do, charge $4 & $5 on shipping small items such as jewelry and we do not send jewelry Priority unless requested in an attempt to save our buyers money. 5. We recommend insurance for all items and will not be held for damage or non-delivery of uninsured items. 6. Postal Claims: Insured items do have a guarantee against damage or non-delivery. For damaged items it is necessary for the buyer to present the packaging and the item to the Post Office to begin the claim. Items.Name: Noah Zebra GiraffeElephant 2x2 LgSleeve Shirt
Items.Location: Laissez les bon temps rouler, Baton Rouge
Items.Description: LONG SLEEVE LADIES EMBROIDERED SHIRT By THAT'S THE WAY TO GO SIZE MEDIUM This is a gently worn shirt that you will just love if you like a little novelty. It has a brown corduroy collar and different colored buttons down the front. Each side on the front has a different embroidery. On the left side is a large embroidery of Noah's Ark on the water. Noah is standing on the deck with 2 birds overhead and 2 penguins walking on board. The front of the ark is decorated with the heads of two elephants and two seals. I took a close-up of the sleeve so you could have a better idea of the color and fabric of this shirt. Looks much better than my pictures. The other side is embroidered with two zebras and two giraffes. Above the animals is embroidered "Two By Two" in a half circle with a yellow flower underneath. The shirt is a light brown almost, but not quite, pinstripe. It does have shoulder pads. The sleeves measure 22" from shoulder seam and 29" from collar. About 22" across front from underarm. Cute Noah's Ark theme. Winning bidder is responsible for the cost of shipping and insurance. I prefer Billpoint, BidPay or Paypal but also accept money orders and cashier's checks from USA bidders.
